channel.title: Food on him.happyhippos
channel.description: Recent content in Food on him.happyhippos

item.title: [2024] Best places to eat in KWC
item.description: Comfort food Lab Street Eats Mark’s Carribbean Malt and Barley - excellent pub style food (be sure to check out the two other sister restaurants, Scran & Dram and Eatery) 1001 Nights and Antalya - great shawarma sandwiches Korner Kitchen - big big portions Arabella Beer Park - really reasonable and tasty burgers, with an excellent selection of beers Asian Kinkaku/Jinzakaya - the best and most expensive AYCE sushi in town, on par with mid-tier Toronto

item.title: Best places (we've found) to eat in KWC - Takeout Edition!
item.description: Since we’ve been confined to our house for more than a year, we’ve done a pretty extensive tour of several restaurants, takeout style. I decided to list them out and go through some of them in a bit of detail. What else is there to do during a global pandemic? Comfort Food Malt and Barley One of our earliest local spots, it’s remained one of our absolute favourites. Everything we’ve tried there has been fantastic, and the portion sizes are great.
